text: @RepAdamSchiff Let it go Pinocchio, it’s commuting a sentence for a elderly man going to a prison during the COVID-19 pandemic. How is this ant different then Democrat run city letting murderers out of jail for the same reason? Let’s not forget the non bail program going on in these same Cities
